text: Mate Borovac (born 2 January 1963) is a former Croatian footballer. During his club career he played mostly for NK Neretva. In late 80s, he was one of the first Croatian (Yugoslavian at that time) players playing in Malaysia. ==References== ==External links== * *personal data Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:NK Neretva players Category:NK Pazinka players Category:NK Varaždin players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Malaysia Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Malaysia Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mate Borovac
